articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Serbian president cancels visit to Serbs in Montenegro
articles.description: Serbia’s president says he’s canceling a private visit to Montenegro amid a row between the two former Balkan allies over a new law that Serbs say discriminates against the Serbian Orthodox Church
articles.content:
BELGRADE, Serbia -- 
Serbias president on Saturday canceled a private visit to Montenegro he'd planned amid a row between the two former Balkan allies over a new law that Serbs say discriminates against the Serbian Orthodox Church.

articles.author: Daniel Manzo
articles.title: Light snow possible for Midwest and Northeast, rain along the East Coast
articles.description: More rain is expected along the East Coast today, and a couple of gusty thunderstorms will also be possible in the Southeast.
articles.content: A pair of cold fronts moving across the eastern U.S. brought another round of heavy rain and some flash flooding on Friday. Over 3 inches of rain was reported outside of Huntsville, Alabama. This comes after parts of the Jackson, Mississippi, area saw daily r… [+3234 chars]

articles.author: MICHAEL KUNZELMAN Associated Press
articles.title: Ex-Maryland lawmaker sentenced to prison for misusing funds
articles.description: A former Maryland state lawmaker has been sentenced to six months in prison followed by two months of home detention for misusing campaign funds for her personal benefit
articles.content:
GREENBELT, Md. -- 
A former Maryland state lawmaker was sentenced Friday to six months in prison followed by two months of home detention for misusing campaign funds for her personal benefit.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Police: Man and goat taken on terrifying three-state drive
articles.description: Police in Oklahoma say a man was arrested on New Year's Day after he allegedly took a truck and drove it more than 100 miles with a sleeping passenger and a goat inside
articles.content:
SAND SPRINGS, Okla. -- 
A man stole a pickup truck with a sleeping passenger and a goat inside it and drove it all the way from Missouri to Oklahoma before releasing the terrified victim and animal and eventually being arrested, authorities say.

articles.title: Man left drugs, gun in designer bags at convenience store
articles.description: Louisiana authorities are perplexed over why a man left apparent designer bags holding drugs, a gun, cash and a digital scale in a convenience store
articles.content:
GALLIANO, La. -- 
Louisiana authorities are perplexed over why a man left apparent designer bags holding drugs, a gun, cash and a digital scale in a convenience store.

articles.title: AP Photos: Disabled Romanian children given chance to shine
articles.description: During Romania's communist era, children with disabilities were shunned, often locked away in institutions or kept at home and deprived of schooling and social interactions
articles.content:

articles.author: NINIEK KARMINI Associated Press
articles.title: 53 dead in Landslides, flash floods in Indonesia's capital
articles.description: Landslides and floods triggered by torrential downpours in Indonesia's capital have left at least 53 people dead as rescuers were struggling to search people apparently buried under tons of mud
articles.content:
JAKARTA, Indonesia -- 
Landslides and floods triggered by torrential downpours have left at least 53 people dead in and around Indonesia's capital, as rescuers struggled to search for people apparently buried under tons of mud, officials said Saturday.
